The goal is to avoid the butterflies, collect butterflies, and interact with cocoons while maintaining a strategy of movement—particularly because the last position remains unchanged. A good action would be to move away from potential threats.

In this case, since the space directly nearby me has butterflies, I would prefer to move left or up --  moving left to (row 5, col 22) is likely to keep me safe from immediate threats:

I expect this action will help move the avatar away from the immediate danger of butterflies positioned near row 5.
